channel.title: Hexen: Edge of Chaos first release was today
channel.description:
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/hexen-edge-of-chaos/downloads/hexen-edge-of-chaos-demo-release[/url]
Doom 3 powered Hexen sequel, so you'll need a fully patched copy of Doom 3 (which is worth the ridiculous $20 price for the Dark Mod alone, btw).
Anyone played it yet? I've been following this mod since it was announced, so I'm obviously excited, but my internet connection is just a tethered phone right now so the download is extremely slow.

item.title: Hexen: Edge of Chaos first release was today
item.dc:creator: nunzilla
item.description:
Holy Moses. I LOVE Hexen. I can’t wait for this to finish downloading. Thanks for sharing this gibbelin. Good eye.

EDIT: Wow, this is so cool. I can’t tell if I love it or not, but it sure does bring back some good memories. They’re doing a pretty damn good job too.

Read full topic
item.source: Hexen: Edge of Chaos first release was today
